datafeed_id.description: The ID of the datafeed to stop

allow_no_match.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard expression matches no datafeeds. (This includes `_all` string or when no datafeeds have been specified)

force.description: True if the datafeed should be forcefully stopped.

timeout.description: Controls the time to wait until a datafeed has stopped. Default to 20 seconds

body.description: The URL params optionally sent in the body
